name: VRGK - Virtual Reality Game Kit - Demo Builds
name_original: VRGK - Virtual Reality Game Kit - Demo Builds
description:
Demo Builds of VRGK - Virtual Reality Game Kit, an Unreal Engine 4 Marketplace Asset Pack to help you get started with your next VR game idea!

Marketplace Link: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/vrgk-virtual-reality-game-kit

** For your Information: THIS IS NOT A GAME **

  • Tested on Oculus Rift, Quest 1 and Valve Index
